did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection consists of publications, in born digital format, from the Academy of Management. Includes individual files each issue of several different publications. Files may in in pdf format or Microsoft doc format. For publications in paper format see Collection 5289 PUBS.

scopecontent.p: Includes issues for AoM News, Current BPS, Footnotes, GDO Newsletter, HR Division Newsletter, IJTD Newsletter, IMD News, MOC Newsletter, News Blast, ODC Newsletter, Pespectives, RMD Newsletter, SIM Newsletter, and TIM List Serve.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: AoM Publications (digital) #5289 PUBS(d). Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5289: Academy of Management Records 5289 MB: Academy of Management Memorabilia 5289 P: Academy of Management Photographs 5289 PUBS: Academy of Management Publications 5593: Academy of Management Additional Records 5593 AV: Academy of Management Audio-Visual Material 5893m: Academy of Management "Status of Women in Academy of Management, Memoir" 5904m: Paul Gordon Collection of Academy of Management Miscellany 5920 AV: Academy of Management Audio-Visual Collection 5977 mf: Academy of Management. Additional. Microfilm copy of publications. 6012: Charles D. Wrege Papers 6019: Academy of Management. Eastern Academy of Management. Records, 1998- 6134: Academy of Management Publications.
